summary: This is an email chain from March 2020 regarding a submission on behalf of an individual (likely Ghislaine Maxwell) concerning a factual statement. The sender argues the individual was a 'cog in Epstein's wheel' and a vulnerable victim, advocating for a non-prosecution disposition.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to indirectly as the person on whose behalf a submission is being made; described as a 'cog in Epstein's wheel' and a 'vulnerable victim'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as the person whose 'wheel' Ghislaine Maxwell was a cog in, indicating her alleged actions were at his direction.

connections.description: Maxwell is described as acting 'entirely at his direction' and as a 'cog in Epstein's wheel'.

events.title: Draft factual statement submission
events.description: A draft factual statement is shared via Google Docs as part of a submission on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell, arguing for a non-prosecution disposition.

keyFacts: A legal submission was being prepared on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell in March 2020.
The submission argues Maxwell was a 'cog in Epstein's wheel' and acted entirely at his direction.
The submission characterizes Maxwell as a 'very vulnerable victim' at the time of the alleged actions.
The proposed disposition is a non-prosecution agreement ('non-pros').
The communication occurred via Google Docs, with the draft factual statement attached.
